title: Ask an Australian about flora and fauna [Greek version]
creator_credit: Artransa Park Studios and Kay Roberts
brief_description: An introduction to the flowers, animals and birds of Australia, highlighting the role of national parks and sanctuaries in the preservation of native shrubs, flowers and creatures, and stressing the laws covering the protection of fauna and flora generally. Note: In Greek.
